person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The nominees , according to diplomats , are : Kofi Annan of Ghana , the U.N. undersecretary-general for peacekeeping ; Ahmedou Ould Abdallah of Mauritania , the former U.N. special envoy for Burundi ; Amara Essy of the Ivory Coast , its foreign minister and the U.N. General Assembly president in 1994-95 ; and Hamid Algabid of Niger , the secretary-general of the Organisation of the Islamic Conference .

Let's think step by step.

1. Kofi Annan - former Secretary-General of the United Nations and under-secretary-general for peacekeeping, hailing from Ghana.
2. Ahmedou Ould Abdallah - former United Nations special envoy for Burundi, from Mauritania.
3. Amara Essy - foreign minister of the Ivory Coast and the President of the United Nations General Assembly in 1994-95.
4. Hamid Algabid - Secretary-General of the Organisation of the Islamic Conference, from Niger.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Kofi Annan - former Secretary-General of the United Nations, hailing from Ghana.
2. Ahmedou Ould Abdallah - former United Nations special envoy, from Mauritania.
3. Amara Essy - foreign minister, from the Ivory Coast.
4. Hamid Algabid - Secretary-General of the Organisation of the Islamic Conference, from Niger.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Kofi Annan - former Secretary-General of the United Nations, hailing from Ghana. |
| Ahmedou Ould Abdallah - former United Nations special envoy, from Mauritania. |
| Amara Essy - foreign minister, from the Ivory Coast. |
| Hamid Algabid - Secretary-General of the Organisation of the Islamic Conference, from Niger. |

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The nominees , according to diplomats , are : Kofi Annan of Ghana , the U.N. undersecretary-general for peacekeeping ; Ahmedou Ould Abdallah of Mauritania , the former U.N. special envoy for Burundi ; Amara Essy of the Ivory Coast , its foreign minister and the U.N. General Assembly president in 1994-95 ; and Hamid Algabid of Niger , the secretary-general of the Organisation of the Islamic Conference .

Let's think step by step.

1. Ghana (Kofi Annan is from Ghana)
2. Mauritania (Ahmedou Ould Abdallah is from Mauritania)
3. Ivory Coast (Amara Essy is the foreign minister of the Ivory Coast)
4. United Nations (Kofi Annan is the U.N. undersecretary-general for peacekeeping)
5. Burundi (Ahmedou Ould Abdallah was the U.N. special envoy for Burundi)
6. United Nations General Assembly (Amara Essy was the president of the UN General Assembly in 1994-95)
7. Niger (Hamid Algabid is the secretary-general of the Organisation of the Islamic Conference which is based in Niger)
8. Organisation of the Islamic Conference (based in Niger)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

1. Ghana
2. Mauritania
3. Ivory Coast
4. Burundi
5. Niger

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to locations.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location |
| --- |
| Ghana |
| Mauritania |
| Ivory Coast |
| Burundi |
| Niger |
